sources.title: This Little Love of Mine (ROMANTIC COMEDY full movie German, romantic films German complete)

metadata.Plot: A brilliant business lawyer, Laura is about to become a partner. For that, she must return to the small tropical island where she grew up, and convince her childhood friend, Chip, to replace his billionaire grandfather at the head of the company he created. Not at all interested, Chip offers Laura a deal: for every moment of fun or relaxation she can afford, he will read a page of the contract. These moments spent together bring them closer together.
metadata.Actors: Saskia Hampele, Liam McIntyre, Lynn Gilmartin
